SELECT c.id, c.article_id, c.user_id, c.parent_id, c.content, c.author_name, c.author_email, c.author_ip, c.likes, c.status, c.created_at, c.updated_at, a.title AS article_title FROM comment c LEFT JOIN article a ON c.article_id = a.id WHERE c.status = 1 ORDER BY c.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
